channel.title: YAML on Lessons & Readings
channel.description: Recent content in YAML on Lessons & Readings

item.title: Lesson 2: Single Page R Markdown ðŸ“ƒ Document
item.description: R Markdown is a versatile framework for creating a range of high-quality documents including HTML, PDF, presentations, books, websites, and more. Markdown allows documents to be simple and portable while R integration gives you the benefit of creating dynamic documents that contain your results (e.g., tables, graphics, and inline values). Results can be computed and rendered dynamically from R code and are more likely to be reproducible. Learning Objectives In this section of the course, you will create a single page R Markdown document and then turn that document into an HTML page.

item.title: Resources
item.description: This page contains quick access to valuable resources, categorized by language or tool including R Markdown, YAML, Markdown, Command Line Interface, CSS & HTML, MathJax. General Learn X in Y minutes. Where X is a programming language. Tutorials available English, Spanish, and many other languages. Use the Highlight your language: button in the upper right corner to filter. Tutorials includes: R English (EN), R Espanol (ES). Markdown EN, Markdown ES.
